statements: UPDATE SupplierCompliance SET sustainability_score = 85 WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SupplierCompliance SET last_audit_date = '2022-03-15', supplier_name = 'Green Suppliers' WHERE supplier_id = '87654321-89ab-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SupplierCompliance SET sustainability_score = 90, last_audit_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE supplier_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SupplierCompliance SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier', sustainability_score = 80 WHERE supplier_id = '98765432-1a2b-3c4d-9e4f-1234567890ab';
UPDATE supplier_data SET sustainability_score = 4.5, supplier_name = 'Global Suppliers' WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE supplier_audit SET audit_result = 'Pass', audit_date = '2022-06-30' WHERE supplier_id = 102;
UPDATE supplier_data SET sustainability_score = 4.5, last_audit_date = '2022-06-30', supplier_name = 'Green Suppliers' WHERE supplier_id = 101
UPDATE supplier_audit SET audit_result = 'Pass', audit_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE supplier_id = 102
UPDATE Suppliers SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET supplier_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE Suppliers SET sustainability_rating = 4, compliance_status = false WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET product_name = 'New Product Name', supplier_id = 2 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE supplier_compliance SET sustainability_score = 80 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supplier_sustainability_data SET water_usage = 2500.50 WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND year = 2021;
UPDATE supplier_compliance SET sustainability_score = sustainability_score + 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supplier_sustainability_data SET energy_consumption = energy_consumption * 1.1, water_usage = water_usage * 0.9 WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND year = 2020;
UPDATE supplier_compliance SET sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE product_inventory SET stock_quantity = 100 WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE supplier_compliance SET sustainability_rating = 4, compliance_status = 'Approved' WHERE supplier_id = 101;
UPDATE product_inventory SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 10, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE product_id = 201;
